creature_reaction.note: Add CHA modifier of interacting character

entries.08-09: Rusty lantern with shattered glass (1 gp)
entries.22-23: 10 gp in a moldy, wood box
entries.26-27: Longbow and bundle of 40 arrows (10 gp)
entries.28-29: Dusty, leather armor dyed black (10 gp)
entries.34-35: 12 gp in the pocket of a ripped cloak
entries.42-43: Obsidian statuette of a forgotten idol (15 gp)
entries.48-49: Bag of 10 silver spikes (2 gp each)
entries.50-53: Mithral locket with a painting of a duskfolk (20 gp)
entries.54-55: Two finely forged ironborn shields (20 gp)
entries.56-57: Pair of silvered daggers (10 gp each)
entries.60-61: Bundle of five red dragon scales (5 gp each)
entries.62-63: Light, warm cloak woven of spidersilk (25 gp)
entries.64-65: Fine set of ivory game pieces (25 gp)
entries.68-69: Matched trio of warhammers (10 gp each)
entries.72-73: Set of silk slippers and a robe (35 gp)
entries.78-79: Mithral shield etched with soaring dragons (40 gp)
entries.80-81: Gold monkey idol with a ruby gripped in its teeth (60 gp)

entries.01: The ground shakes violently and a massive fissure opens
entries.02-03: An unseen foe leaps out of hiding at close range
entries.04-05: A horrible buzzing fills the air, growing louder and louder
entries.06-07: You catch the acrid smell of smoke and flame
entries.08-09: A bright star appears in the sky, visible even at midday
entries.10-11: You spot a half-open bag with gold coins glinting inside
entries.12-13: A man slips a note and an odd potion into your hand
entries.14-15: Someone observing you from afar steps out of sight
entries.16-17: An ironborn in a red hat hands you a rose, bows, and leaves
entries.18-19: A cowled stranger in a black cloak approaches you
entries.20-21: Someone tries to pick your pocket
entries.22-23: A strange ticking sound comes from inside your bag
entries.24-25: A frothing, frantic horse with a saddle but no rider appears
entries.26-27: A mound in the earth quickly burrows toward you
entries.28-29: You sense you are being magically scryed upon
entries.30-31: Someone tries to plant an object on your person
entries.32-33: You are filled with a strong sense of dread and danger
entries.34-35: A woman hands you a black cat and then runs away
entries.36-37: A small, woodland creature jumps out of a backpack
entries.38-39: You smell lilacs and hear faint, ghostly laughter
entries.40-41: A note wrapped around a thin dagger lands next to you
entries.42-43: A green-glowing meteor streaks through the sky
entries.44-45: Someone nearby is staring at you and mouthing words
entries.46-47: A pair of yellow eyes watches you from the darkness
entries.48-49: An orc with an arrow in her back crashes through a door
entries.50-53: You hear a beast cry out in pain just up ahead
entries.54-55: A huge swarm of bats crashes over you and swirls away
entries.56-57: A frail beggar whispers that he has a secret to tell you
entries.58-59: An object falls from above and barely misses your head
entries.60-61: A seagull lands on your head and coughs up an odd bottle
entries.62-63: The smell of ozone rises and electricity crackles in the air
entries.64-65: You spot a trail of tiny silver coins leading around a bend
entries.66-67: A wild-eyed man approaches with a holy book held high
entries.70-71: A stampede of wild animals bursts into view
entries.72-73: An old woman points at you and yells, "There they are!"
entries.74-75: A passing stranger presses an ancient coin into your hand
entries.76-77: A chorus of howls echo in the distance
entries.78-79: Two pinching and slapping goblins tumble into sight
entries.80-81: You realize you are not alone; something is behind you
entries.82-83: The sudden sound of rushing water crashes toward you
entries.84-85: You hear an ear-splitting scream that nobody else hears
entries.86-87: A man slaps you with a glove and throws it at your feet
entries.88-89: A violent, windy storm kicks up without warning
entries.90-91: Lightning strikes close and leaves a glowing object behind
entries.92-93: A multicolored orb drifts up to you and then zips away
entries.94-95: A runaway wagon crashes toward you
entries.96-97: An NPC throws off their disguise, revealing an enemy
entries.98-99: A demon appears to you and presents a tempting offer
entries.00: A radiant being appears to you with a message of warning

entries.01: An armored beast the size of a ship is rampaging nearby
entries.02-03: A team of assassins is on its way to kill your group
entries.04-05: The local ruler has placed a 2,000 gp bounty on your heads
entries.06-07: A doomsday cult is planning a fiery coup at midnight
entries.08-09: An ancient, stone door has been found in the castle cellar
entries.10-11: Lizardfolk have been raiding caravans near the swamp
entries.12-13: Armored skeletons are roaming the misty graveyard
entries.14-15: An earthquake uncovered a ruin inside a deep rift
entries.16-17: A warband of orcs has taken over an abandoned keep
entries.18-19: There is a hall of golden statues underneath the well
entries.20-21: Those who survive the Trial of the Lotus gain a strange gift
entries.22-23: A Captain of the Guard has been taken hostage by thugs
entries.24-25: The Crystal Caves are home to a cult of psychic sorcerers
entries.26-27: A crocodile dragged a richly-laden mule into the sewers
entries.28-29: A fortune-telling witch speaks true omens and portents
entries.30-31: Every full moon, the Prancing Unicorn's larder is robbed
entries.32-33: A famous group of crawlers hasn't returned from a delve
entries.34-35: A glowing meteor crashed deep inside the marshlands
entries.36-37: Fire will not light or burn within sight of the Lion Fountain
entries.38-39: The lost Jewel of Barbalt is hidden in the Howling Caves
entries.40-41: An ironborn mining team has uncovered a tentacled statue
entries.42-43: The Red Owl tavern has a trapdoor to the deep dark
entries.44-45: Serpentine warriors guard a shrine to a medusa in the jungle
entries.46-47: Three thieves just pulled off a gemstone heist nearby
entries.48-49: Harpies keep watch from the cliffs around Diridia's Tomb
entries.50-53: A gorgon stalks the ruins of the Underhill Halls
entries.54-55: Beneath the Red Abbey is the forgotten Barrow of Ur-Din
entries.56-57: A dying sage is calling for a mighty group of heroes
entries.58-59: An arcanist accidentally let his trio of cockatrices escape
entries.60-61: A local lord has somehow been stranded atop a high roof
entries.62-63: Bartomeu the Pirate Prince will be hanged at noon
entries.64-65: Gremlin spelunkers found an underground cathedral
entries.66-67: A merchant cog was lost in the sea near the Dim Shoals
entries.68-69: Rare and valuable mushrooms grow inside an old crypt
entries.70-71: The Church of St. Terragnis will pay for the return of a relic
entries.72-73: A volcanic eruption revealed tunnels in the caldera's walls
entries.74-75: The cyclopean ruins of Tal-Yool lie deep within the forest
entries.76-77: A famous gambler will bet a ruby on a card game
entries.78-79: The Moon Druids will bless a sword used to slay a werewolf
entries.80-81: Gravediggers found a chained coffin in an unmarked plot
entries.82-83: An abandoned arcanist's tower is full of clockwork creatures
entries.84-85: The Thieves' Guild is about to attack a rival merchant lord
entries.86-87: Windstorms uncovered a stone monolith in the desert
entries.88-89: A rival group of crawlers found the map to Jiraal's Hoard
entries.90-91: A monstrosity called The Oracle lurks below the university
entries.92-93: The Ophidian Armor is in Ekmara's Keep in the wasteland
entries.94-95: The princess has been kidnapped by a group of sorcerers
entries.96-97: A Chaos Knight's tomb has been found beneath a temple
entries.98-99: The fabled Library of Gehemna appeared outside the city
entries.00: The dragon Ixamir has awoken from her 200-year slumber

entries.01: A mutated tunnel hulk explodes through a crumbling wall
entries.02-03: A silent gelatinous cube sweeps up a corridor
entries.04-05: A roving brown bear scavenges for dead bodies to eat
entries.06-07: Rival crawlers confront the PCs; they were "here first"
entries.08-09: 1d6 rust monsters swarm a crack bubbling with mercury
entries.10-11: A legless suit of animated armor pulls itself along the floor
entries.12-13: A groaning wall collapses at the slightest touch
entries.14-15: A chalk note on the wall: "Karov, we'll be at the Loyal Hog"
entries.16-17: Mort the gremlin is digging in cracks for grubs and beetles
entries.18-19: The floor collapses into a pit 1d6 x 10 feet deep
entries.20-21: A raiding team of 2d4 hobgoblins moves in tight formation
entries.22-23: 2d4 web-covered skeletons form from scattered bones
entries.24-25: 1d4 giant dung beetles roll huge balls of dried excrement
entries.26-27: An ochre jelly hides inside a pond or sinkhole
entries.28-29: A single, perfect rose grows up between the flagstones
entries.30-31: 2d4 bandits shutter lanterns and set up a hasty ambush
entries.32-33: Three gremlins toughen each other's skulls with frying pans
entries.34-35: 2d6 brinehounds pummel a giant centipede with rocks
entries.36-37: A gas leak causes all light sources to explode and go out
entries.38-39: A gelatinous cube full of handy items is stuck inside a pit
entries.40-41: A swarm of clattering, gold scarab beetles flies into sight
entries.42-43: A wounded NPC staggers up to the PCs and begs for help
entries.44-45: A rusty portcullis slams down, separating the PCs
entries.46-47: A giant spider hides above an old, rotten backpack
entries.48-49: A weeping ghost floats by, distracted by its own ranting
entries.50-53: 2d4 kobolds sneak up behind the PCs for a surprise attack
entries.54-55: Ancient clay pots vibrate with hypnotizing resonance
entries.56-57: 1d6 rockfangs shred dead giant rats and use the fur for nesting
entries.58-59: Rival crawlers escort a frail noble tourist on an "adventure"
entries.60-61: 3d4 gremlin scavengers barter and trade for odd trinkets
entries.62-63: 2d4 ironborn miners (soldiers) shore up a collapsing wall
entries.64-65: 2d4 giant wasps build a huge, papery nest on the ceiling
entries.66-67: A dense cloud of sulfuric mist rises from a floor crack
entries.68-69: A swarm of spiders surges out of a gauzy egg sack
entries.70-71: An ogre named Lud scratches rude words into the wall
entries.72-73: 1d6 gremlins brawl with 2d4 kobolds over a rockfang carcass
entries.74-75: 2d4 giant bats roost on the ceiling; light disturbs them
entries.76-77: A webspinner spins web cocoons around its still-living prey
entries.78-79: 1d6 cultists hunt for humanoid bones for a nefarious ritual
entries.80-81: A dryad searches for her tree that bugbears chopped up
entries.82-83: A deep gnome plays haunting music on humming fungi
entries.84-85: 2d6 kobolds work in a makeshift, volatile alchemy lab
entries.86-87: A stone golem endlessly stacks the same rocks into piles
entries.88-89: Two shroudwings circle each other in a duel of intimidation
entries.90-91: 2d6 gremlins carry their bugbear king on a rickety litter
entries.92-93: 2d4 cavern stalkers swarm up the hallway
entries.94-95: A recent campfire still burns with glowing cinders
entries.96-97: A minotaur guides a mysterious merchant along a path
entries.98-99: Roll two encounters and combine the results (reroll 98-99)
entries.00: The body of a dead crawler holds a random magic item
